column2: "The number of ARKS coming to this planet, it's kind of strange don't you think?"
"Even for precautions against Darkers, there's still too many."
"In the Tundra area beyond here, famous ARKS are dispatched occasionally."
"Don't worry as long as you stick to the forest, I doubt you'll run into them."
"If you want to investigate what's going on, you're going to have to head to the tundra."
